argument.description: A char, varchar2, nchar, or nvarchar2 value converted to multibyte characters. This function will return its result in the same character set as char.

returnType: The TO_MULTI_BYTE function returns a multibyte character value that will be in the same character set as the char parameter.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL TO_MULTI_BYTE function returns a character value with all of the single-byte characters converted to multibyte characters. To use this function, your database character set contains both single-byte and multibyte characters.
sample:
select TO_MULTI_BYTE('Tech on the net')
from dual;
